name: interisland
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between islands: We can also arrange interisland flights and hotel accommodation. Gale force winds have halted inter-island ferry traffic.
More examplesFewer examplesWe have just returned from Greece where we took several inter-island ferries.Barbados faced fierce interisland rivalry and strong competition from Jamaica and Trinidad.The report finds that a ferry service would provide an innovative alternative for interisland travel.The interisland airlines are reluctant to raise their ticket prices any further.
